member.name: T:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.Minify.MinifyResult

member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Name of individual minification process name.
Starting length of the data to be minified.

member.name: P:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.Minify.MinifyResult.ProcessName
member.summary: Name of process within the minification, if the minification is not split into individual elements then the name of the minification engine.

member.summary: Length of data before minification has taken place.

member.name: P:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.Minify.MinifyResult.EndLength
member.summary: Length of data after minification has completed.

member.summary: Time taken to complete the minification

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.Minify.MinifyResult.Finalise(System.Int32,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Called to indicate the minification process is complete and store the final length of data and time taken in 1000ths ms.
member.param: Time taken to complete the minification.

member.name: T:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.SystemAdmin.LoadedModulesMenu
member.summary:
Returns a list of all assemblies currently loaded by the application and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.SystemAdmin.LoadedModulesMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns delimited data on all loaded assemblies and their version.

member.name: T:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.SystemAdmin.LoadedPluginsMenu
member.summary:
Returns a list of all plugin modules that are loaded and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.SystemAdmin.LoadedPluginsMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns delimited data on all plugin modules that have been loaded by AspNetCore.PluginManager.

member.name: T:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.SystemAdmin.ThreadMenu
member.summary:
Returns a list of all threads and their current status that can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.SystemAdmin.ThreadMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns delimited data on current active threads and their current status

member.name: T:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.LoggerStatistics
member.summary:
Returns a list of the last 100 log entries that can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu and ILogger

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.Classes.LoggerStatistics.Data
member.summary: Returns delimited data on current log data, this will only store the last 100 entries.

member.summary: Static class containing methods that can be used to configure and initialise the Plugin Manager.

member.summary: Initialises the PluginManager using default confguration.

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.PluginManagerService.Initialise(PluginManager.PluginManagerConfiguration@)
member.summary: Initialises the PluginManager using a specific user defined configuration.

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.PluginManagerService.Finalise
member.summary: Finalises the PluginManger, provides an opportunity for the plugins to clean up ready for close down.

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.PluginManagerService.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Configures all plugin modules, allowing the modules to setup services for the application.
member.exception: Thrown when the Plugin Manager has not been initialised.

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.PluginManagerService.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment)
member.summary: Configure all plugin modules, this method is now deprecated and will be removed in a future release

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.PluginManagerService.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Configures all plugin module services, allowing the modules to add their own services to the application.

member.name: M:AspNetCore.PluginManager.PluginManagerService.UsePlugin(System.Type)
member.summary:
UsePlugin is designed to load plugins that have been statically loaded into the host application specifically nuget packages or project references.
If a plugin is required to be initialised prior to other plugins, you can alter the load order by calling UsePlugin prior to calling Initialise.
member.param: Type of IPlugin interface. The type passed in must inherit IPlugin interface.
member.exception: Thrown when the iPluginType does not implement IPlugin interface.

member.name: P:AspNetCore.PluginManager.PluginManagerService.HasInitialised
member.summary: Indicates whether the Plugin manager service has been initialised or not

member.name: P:AspNetCore.PluginManager.PluginManagerService.ApplicationRootPath
member.summary: Returns the root path for the application
